Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2016 07:39PM Totallytubular wrote: Hello - I think the head sweats are possibly from the steroids. My head would get hot and face pink for two days after CMF chemo. I am fine now. And chemo is finished... But still getting hot flashes.. Yes it's that exciting! Although I am 53 so normal. I put the air conditioner on highQ that seemed to help a bit to not trigger more. You will get through this! Mary
Posts.Title: Head sweats anyone? Reg2 leftduetostupidmods
